mapper.select: SELECT id id, school school, major major, `year` year, `desc` descStr FROM jl_education WHERE jl_id = #{jlId} ORDER BY sort_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jl_education ( school, major, `year`, `desc`, jl_id, sort_num ) VALUES ( #{school}, #{major}, #{year}, #{descStr}, #{jlId}, #{sortNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jl_education SET school = #{school}, major = #{major}, `year` = #{year}, `desc` = #{descStr}, jl_id = #{jlId}, sort_num = #{sortNum} WHERE id = #{id}
